model Person {
    fields {
        name  Text
    }
    operations {
        get getPerson(id)
        update updatePerson(id, name)
        list listPeople(name)
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }

    operations {
        get getPerson(id)
        update updatePerson(id, name)
        list listPeople(name)
    }
}
